body.html:
Hey Mark, awesome to see you lead growth strategy at King Street – I also focus on Toronto. Wanted to run something by you.

I’ve been working with a marketing agency like yours. By the second month, we generated 12 appointments - they closed $14.5K in retainers.

So my offer is simple: if in the first month you don’t get appointments with your target clients, you don’t pay.

Worth a quick 15-min chat?
If yes - drop me your calendar link

Sent from my iPhone
